runs.comm: Bond sends this in outside off to Gambhir, he lets it go
short of a length, on the hips, gambhir fends it off to the on side
pitched outside leg, Gambhir struck on the pads while trying to shuffle
close! full outside off, Gambhir gets a big stride across to drive, the ball gets the under edge of the bat and rolls past the stumps to the on side
Sehwag off the mark with a glide with an open face to third man
first signs of aggression! short and Gambhir hooks, the ball is skied to fine leg but he doesnt get the timing right, fine leg gets ito it on the bounce
wide outside off, tempts Sehwag to flash at it, big away movement, beats the outside edge
poor line, poor length, outside off and Sehwag throws his bat at it, the ball flies off the face of the bat to the cover boundary
Gillespie gets this one to dart back in sharply, cuts Sehwag in half, the ball clips the thigh pad en route to the keeper, appeal follows, the umpire says Not Out
and India join the party! full, on middle and leg, Sehwag stays at the crease and lofts over long-on
good length outside off, pushed to cover
strays off line, drifts towards the pads, Sehwag flicks this away on one leg to the right of fine leg, Bond dives in vain near the fence
full an in the slot to drive, gambhir drives square straight to point, good looking shot but no runs
lovely stroke! good length on off stump, swings across the line and the ball flies over deep midwicket off the meat of the bat
Bond panics, lands this one outside off, gambhir gets on his knees and slashes this over the slips
Bond struggles with his line again, too full and wide, Gambhir gets forward and lofts this over cover
beaten! Gambhir tries a hat-trick of fours, gets forward to slam it square and misses
superb stuff! overpitched, waiting to be driven, Gambhir gets forward and launches into a lovely cover drive, beats everyone
turned to short fine leg, Sehwag scampers to the other end and beats the throw, risky but India will take it
round the wicket this time, Gambhir plays an uppish drive to mid-off, sets off
good length outside off, Sehwag hops and pushes that towards point
full, outside off and Gambhir throws his bat at it, the thick outside edge beats McCullum by a mile
Gillespie struggles with his line and slides down leg
good comeback, lands this on a yorker length, keeps Gambhir quiet for a change
full, Gambhir launches into another uppish drive, the ball gets the top edge and lands safely between fine leg and point, streaky though
bad start for patel, full, outside off and Sehwag slams this on the front foot past cover and point
backs away to the leg stump and Sehwag executes a brutal slice, the ball goes airborne to third man
pushed in flatter and faster, backs away to the leg stump and pushes this to mid-on
tossed up on middle and off, Gambhir deftly nudges it to the on side
charges down the track, Sehwag takes this on the full and launches this to cow corner
Patel's nigthmare continues, Sehwag steps down and carts this over deep extra cover
welcome Mr Oram! low full toss, gambhir waits on it and drives this firmly past mid-off
Oram slips another low full toss but gets away with it, Gambhir drives to long-on
full and close to a yorker outside off, Sehwag waits on it and digs it out past short third man, the superb timing gives no fielder a chance
good ball, Sehwag pushes it back to Oram
Oram gets his man! low full toss on middle and leg, Sehwag swings across the line, the ball meets the toe edge of the bat and scoops to Styris on the edge of the circle at midwicket
good length on the stumps, Uthappa quietly plays it down back to Oram
Gambhir takes a few paces forward, Vettori holds the length back, Gambhir defends
outside off and glanced to short third-man
soft dismissal! switches to round the wicket for Uthappa, tossed up on off stump, draws him forward, Uthappa drives uppishly back to Vettori who takes the return catch with ease
outside off, Dhoni chops it down to the off side
width offered outside off and cut to deep point
pushed back to Vettori, good first over from Vettori
good length on off stump, Dhoni shapes to glance on the on side, turned to midwicket
short of a length outside off, not much pace on that, glided to cover
good restrictive stuff from Oram, drifts on the pads and gambhir only manages to turn it to the on side circle for a single
low full toss on leg stump, Dhoni quietly pushes it to long-on, the lack of pace on the ball is working against India here
slapped off the front foot past cover, Vincent does well in the deep to cut it off
just a touch wide outside off, cut away hard to deep extra cover, another good over for NZ
raw pace, on middle and leg, Dhoni plays it down to the on side
slower ball, Gambhir goes for an across-the-line swipe, top edge lands safely down to fine leg
driven to the off side for a single
full, on off stump, Dhoni gives room and drives hard to long-off
outside off and full, Gambhir launches into a full blooded cover drive, the fielder in the deep cuts it off
thudded in short of a length outside off, played on the hop to deep point
slow, drifting on the pads, turned to short fine-leg
Gambhir backs away a little to the leg side, off cutter, turned to the off side for a single
no pace to work with, all Dhoni can do is work it to the off side
another offcutter, Gambhir makes room and drives to long-off
driven to long-off again
short of a length, pulled to deep square leg
short ball pulled uppishly towards midwicket
lovely use of the feet, Gambhir comes down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and with a full swing of the arms lofts it over the long-on boundary
pushed towards cover on the front foot
flighted delivery outside off stump, Dhoni comes forward and cuts through covers for  a single

caught! Massive wicket for New Zealand, Gambhir came down the track but Vettori saw him and bowled a much slower ball, Gambhir had to re-adjust his shot and played the pull too early, the ball bounces off his glove and lobs up for McCullum who takes an easy catch
flighted delivery on leg stump, Yuvraj gets across his stumps and sweeps to long leg
driven off the back foot towards long-off for a single
full ball on off stump, driven to cover off the front foot where Vettori dives to his left and stops the ball
Yuvraj tries to run it towards third man but gets beaten by the bounce
played off the pads through square leg
just a fraction short from Styris, Dhoni moves on to the back foot and pulls to long-on
good length ball on off stump, Yuvraj sits on the back foot and plays a half-pull towards long-off for a single
tossed up nicely on off stump, Yuvraj pushes it towards cover for one more
that's drilled down the ground with a lot of power, Patel bowled it full on off and middle stump, Dhoni waited on the back foot and hammered it straight past the bowler
Dhoni comes down the track and Patel fires it in towards the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg
caught in the deep! Yuvraj played the slog-sweep too early and skied the top edge towards deep square leg where Taylor moves to his right and takes the catch on the run
driven to long-on for one more
Karthik leans forward and plays the ball off his pads towards short fine leg
bowled full outside the off stump, Karthik drives off the front foot to deep cover, New Zealand won't mind the singles
short ball on middle stump, it sits up for Dhoni who swivels and plays the pull with a lot of muscle, he's placed that superbly and the ball races over the midwicket boundary
full length on off stump, Dhoni lofts it in the air towards long-off, the ball reaches the fielder on the bounce
superb placement, Styris bowls it full outside off stump, Karthik opens the face and squeezes the ball all along the ground past point for four more

an awful mix-up and Dhoni has to go! Karthik drives the ball firmly off the back foot  to Vettori at cover, Dhoni sprints for the single but Karthik sends him back, there wasn't a run in it for Karthik had hit to straight and hard to Vettori who picked up cleanly and threw it back to Styris, Dhoni made a despairing dive but he was a couple of inches short when styris whipped off the bails
full ball outside the off stump, Karthik leans forward and lifts over extra cover for the third boundary of the over
bowled flat and quick on leg and middle stump, defended towards midwicket, the batsman hesitate and decide against the single
beaten outside the off stump
fired in quick outside the off stump, Pathan tries to play it behind square on the off side but gets beaten
pulled behind square for a single
full and straight on middle stump, very tight bowling from Vettori, Karthik leans forward and pushes it to midwicket
flat delivery on middle stump, Pathan flicks it off his pads behind square leg, just three runs off the overs
bowled flat in the air from round the wicket, angling it into the left-hander, played through covers for a single
Karthik tries to slog sweep from outside off stump but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Karthik plays a reverse sweep but doesn't beat the fielder at short third man
Pathan steps down the pitch but Patel fires it into the blockhole, Pathan can only dig it out back to the bowler
this time Pathan gets under the ball and lofts it straight over the bowlers head, Taylor runs to his right and makes a stunning dive but the ball is too far away from him
Pathan steps down the track once again and swings a full toss over deep midwicket, the ball bounces inches inside the boundary
Karthik backs away and cuts a ball from middle stump to backward point
bowled him! Vettori bowls a superb arm ball on middle and off stump, Pathan backs away, tries to run it fine but gets beaten for pace and has his off stump pegged back
Agarkar gets off the mark by pushing one into the covers off the front foot
Karthik tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten by the bounce, Vettori got that to spin and bounce sharply
dropped, Karthik steps down the pitch and lofts the ball straight to Fulton at long-on who drops an awful sitter, the ball bounces off his hands and rolls to the boundary
caught this time! Karthik tries to slog sweep Vettori but doesn't get the necessary elevation, he holes out to Bond at deep square leg who takes an easy catch
flicked off the pads to Vincent at midwicket who hits the stumps at the bowler's end, Harbhajan didn't ground his bat, merely plonked it it the crease but he was just home

it's Vincent again with the direct hit and this time he's got Agarkar, Vincent swooped down on Agarkar's push to midwicket and under-armed the throw back to the non-striker's end, Agarkar is inches short
driven hard off the back foot to cover
banged in short outside the off stump and Gillespie beats Harbhajan with the extra bounce
this one if full just outside the off stump, Harbhajan tries to smash it through midwicket but doesn't make contact
full and wide outside the off stump, Harbhajan throws his bat at it and places the ball between short third man and backward point for four
length ball outside off stump, Sreesanth steps forward and flat-bats it past mid-off for four, Bond needs to be fuller
that was in the slot outside off stump but Sreesanth backed away and tried to slog it over midwicket rather than through the off side, he doesn't make contact
he backs away again and plays it to Vettori at cover
caught! Harbhajan gets under a good length ball and skies it high in the air, Vettori settles under it at short cover and takes a steepling catch
edged down to third man for another boundary, Bond has been expensive once again
played towards backward point with an open face
that's four of them, Sreesanth backs away to a full toss and gets a thick outside edge that runs fine down to third man
full ball from round the wicket hits Sreesanth on the boot, the ball runs towards third man for two leg byes
Sreesanth charges down the pitch and Gillespie responds with a full ball outside off that squeezes under Sreesanth's outstretched bat
Sreesanth charges again and edges another ball past McCullum for four more
barring a no-ball, New Zealand have won it, Gillespie bowls a full toss on off stump that Sreesanth can only hit to Vettori at cover
that's it! New Zealand have won by ten runs, Sreesanth drives a full length delivery to cover to take a single off the last ball
